en: Don't smoke. Your wallet and lungs will thank you.
Soda is like that ex — sweet, but toxic.
Quitting sucks... but not as much as coughing your lungs out.
You're stronger than that can of soda. Crush it.
Fixodent may taste bad, but failure tastes worse.
sr: Ne puši. Novčanik i pluća će ti aplaudirati.
Gazirani sok je kao bivša: sladak, ali otrovan.
Okej, teško je, ali nije teže od kašlja bez kraja.
Jači si od limenke. Zgnječi je (bukvalno).
Fixodent ima grozan ukus, ali neuspeh je gori.
